scripts.watch: [ ! -d "./dist" ] && npm run build; nodemon -e ts,js -w src -x "./node_modules/.bin/tsc; cd dist; ts-node-esm index.js"
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && tsc && cp package.json dist/ && cd dist && npm i --production
scripts.package: rm -rf dist && tsc && cp -r node_modules_prod dist/node_modules && cp package.json dist/ && cd dist && zip -r9 ../test_function_js.zip . && cd ..
